overview: The Department of the Attorney General supports the bill and requests it be amended to include "eight new claims were resolved that total $1,285,077.67 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt)" (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt). With the addition of these claims, the total number of claims in the bill is now thirty-one. The purpose of the bill remains to "seek appropriations to satisfy claims against the State, its officers, or its employees" (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt).
appropriations: The Department of the Attorney General requests that the bill be amended to increase the requested appropriation by $1,285,077.67 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) for eight new claims. Including the new claims, the total appropriation request is $7,854,458.74 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt). The updated request is for an appropriation of $6,444,458.74 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) from the general fund and $1,410,000.00 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) from departmental funds.
agency_impact: The Senate Committee on Ways and Means "received written comments in support of this measure from the Department of Transportation, Department of Education, Attorney General, and Department of Hawaiian Home Lands" (HB990_SD1_SSCR1686_.HTM.txt). The Hawaii State Department of Education supports the measure, stating it "enables timely resolution of legal obligations, preventing unnecessary litigation and financial burdens" (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt). The Department of Hawaiian Home Lands also supports the bill, noting that resolving these cases will allow the department to "focus on its mission to develop and deliver land to native Hawaiians" (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt).
revenue_sources: The Department of the Attorney General testimony indicates that seven of the eight new claims, totaling $1,215,077.67 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt), are requested to be paid from the general fund. One new claim for $70,000.00 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) is requested to be paid from departmental funds. The updated total appropriation request includes $6,444,458.74 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) from the general fund for twenty-seven claims and $1,410,000.00 (HB990_SD1_TESTIMONY_WAM_04-01-25_.PDF.txt) from departmental funds for four claims.
